duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and develop best-in-class partner facing capabilities with a focus on profitability and practice maturity.
Collaborate with IT to deliver an automated partner experience with predictive insights and analytics.
Establish execution strategy and outcomes for product releases, including communication and change management.
Leverage industry practices to define feature requirements, business plans, user stories, wireframes, and acceptance criteria aligned with business outcomes.
Identify collaboration opportunities with key organizations across Corporate and regions.
Act as a technology and partner evangelist both internally and externally representing core values and brand.
Contribute to fostering a culture based on respect, inclusion, and accountability.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
